function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of physical distancing in public spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement wider trails, walkways, and pedestrian crossings to increase physical distancing","Technologies":"Design and urban planning tools for creating wider spaces and pathways","People":"Public using public spaces","Owner":"Urban planners, designers, local government"},{"Description":"Inadequate monitoring of public spaces","Impact":"Potential spread of infectious diseases in public spaces","Mitigation":"Increase awareness and monitoring of public spaces to avoid the spread of the virus","Technologies":"Surveillance technology, public awareness campaigns","People":"Public using public spaces, local authorities","Owner":"Local government, health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate adaptation of urban design to promote physical distancing","Impact":"Risk of continued transmission of infectious diseases due to unmodified urban design","Mitigation":"Implement walkable, activity-friendly urban design with modifications for physical distancing","Technologies":"Urban planning tools, architectural design principles","People":"Public using public spaces, urban planners, designers","Owner":"Urban planners, designers, local government"}]}
